title: Want to Buy: T206 Doc Marshall PSA 7 Cert #:07075740
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: Want to Buy: T206 Doc Marshall PSA 7 Cert #:07075740
posts.post_content: I know it's a long shot, but if you own the attached card and would like to sell it at a profit, I'm interested. Please email me: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Can you be more specific, Trae?
I suppose so, Frank, if I had a back scan. :D

You crack me up, Frank.

Trae, I presume you already looked at VCP and saw it last traded on eBay back in 2013, but I don't see the eBay seller's screen name (pescispizza) as still existing.  Is there any way to see what name it was changed to?  Perhaps he could put you in contact with the buyer.

Alternatively, perhaps this is your card:
[url]http://bbcards4u2.com/Slabbed7NrMt.htm[/url]
"1909 T206297Doc Marshall [Piedmont 350 back]BrooklynNrMt (PSA 7)1,300.00"

Good luck in your search,
Steve

I really appreciate that, Steve. I don't think there's a way to find out the new user id, but I could be wrong on that.

I've emailed Larry, thanks a lot for the link.

No problem.  My usefulness in terms of knowledge is definitely far below that of other people around here.  The least I can do is help look for things.  :)

Steve


[quote name="T206.org" post=1367280]I really appreciate that, Steve. I don't think there's a way to find out the new user id, but I could be wrong on that.

I've emailed Larry, thanks a lot for the link.[/QUOTE]
Thanks again, Steve. No reply from Larry unfortunately (and I found a lot of things I was interested in on his site!). Just bumping this thread for now. Cheers
